name: Aviation Performance Solutions
about: Aviation Performance Solutions (APS) is a leading aviation training company based in Mesa, Arizona, specializing in Upset Prevention and Recovery Training (UPRT). Founded in 1996, APS trains pilots of all experience levels to mitigate the risk of Loss of Control In-flight (LOC-I), the number one fatal threat in aviation. With facilities in the USA, Europe, and partnerships with CAE and other industry leaders, APS offers integrated training using computer-based, on-aircraft, and full-flight simulator platforms. Their programs, including VFR, Professional, and Jet Pilot UPRT, are tailored to various operational needs and enhance manual aircraft handling, airmanship, and overall safety. APS has trained over 30,000 pilots annually and is committed to ensuring every pilot is in control, all the time.
